**Documentation Location**
Which documentation needs attention?
- [ ] README
- [ ] API reference (docs/5.reference/)
- [ ] Guides (docs/3.guides/)
- [ ] Cookbook (docs/4.cookbook/)
- [ ] Learning materials (docs/2.learn/)
- [ ] Code comments/GoDoc
- [ ] Other:

**Issue Type**
- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Outdated content
- [ ] Typo or formatting
- [ ] Broken link
- [ ] Missing example

**Description**
A clear description of the documentation issue.

**Current Content**
Quote or link to the current documentation if applicable.

**Suggested Improvement**
What should the documentation say instead?

**Additional Context**
Any other context that would help address this issue.
